4965  Triangulation<dim, spacedim> & tria,
4966  const std::function<types::manifold_id(
4967  const std::set<types::manifold_id> &)> &disambiguation_function,
4968  bool overwrite_only_flat_manifold_ids)
4969  {
4970  // Easy case first:
4971  if (dim == 1)
4972  return;
4973  const unsigned int n_subobjects =
4974  dim == 2 ? tria.n_lines() : tria.n_lines() + tria.n_quads();
4975 
4976  // If user index is zero, then it has not been set.
4977  std::vector<std::set<types::manifold_id>> manifold_ids(n_subobjects + 1);
4978  std::vector<unsigned int> backup;
4979  tria.save_user_indices(backup);
4980  tria.clear_user_data();
4981 
4982  unsigned next_index = 1;
4983  for (auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
4984  {
4985  if (dim > 1)
4986  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < cell->n_lines(); ++l)
4987  {
4988  if (cell->line(l)->user_index() == 0)
4989  {
4990  AssertIndexRange(next_index, n_subobjects + 1);
4991  manifold_ids[next_index].insert(cell->manifold_id());
4992  cell->line(l)->set_user_index(next_index++);
4993  }
4994  else
4995  manifold_ids[cell->line(l)->user_index()].insert(
4996  cell->manifold_id());
4997  }
4998  if (dim > 2)
4999  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < cell->n_faces(); ++l)
5000  {
5001  if (cell->quad(l)->user_index() == 0)
5002  {
5003  AssertIndexRange(next_index, n_subobjects + 1);
5004  manifold_ids[next_index].insert(cell->manifold_id());
5005  cell->quad(l)->set_user_index(next_index++);
5006  }
5007  else
5008  manifold_ids[cell->quad(l)->user_index()].insert(
5009  cell->manifold_id());
5010  }
5011  }
5012  for (auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
5013  {
5014  if (dim > 1)
5015  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < cell->n_lines(); ++l)
5016  {
5017  const auto id = cell->line(l)->user_index();
5018  // Make sure we change the manifold indicator only once
5019  if (id != 0)
5020  {
5021  if (cell->line(l)->manifold_id() ==
5022  numbers::flat_manifold_id ||
5023  overwrite_only_flat_manifold_ids == false)
5024  cell->line(l)->set_manifold_id(
5025  disambiguation_function(manifold_ids[id]));
5026  cell->line(l)->set_user_index(0);
5027  }
5028  }
5029  if (dim > 2)
5030  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < cell->n_faces(); ++l)
5031  {
5032  const auto id = cell->quad(l)->user_index();
5033  // Make sure we change the manifold indicator only once
5034  if (id != 0)
5035  {
5036  if (cell->quad(l)->manifold_id() ==
5037  numbers::flat_manifold_id ||
5038  overwrite_only_flat_manifold_ids == false)
5039  cell->quad(l)->set_manifold_id(
5040  disambiguation_function(manifold_ids[id]));
5041  cell->quad(l)->set_user_index(0);
5042  }
5043  }
5044  }
5045  tria.load_user_indices(backup);
5046  }
5047 
5048 
5049 
5050  template <int dim, int spacedim>
5051  std::pair<unsigned int, double>
5052  get_longest_direction(
5053  typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator cell)
5054  {
5055  double max_ratio = 1;
5056  unsigned int index = 0;
5057 
5058  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < dim; ++i)
5059  for (unsigned int j = i + 1; j < dim; ++j)
5060  {
5061  unsigned int ax = i % dim;
5062  unsigned int next_ax = j % dim;
5063 
5064  double ratio =
5065  cell->extent_in_direction(ax) / cell->extent_in_direction(next_ax);
5066 
5067  if (ratio > max_ratio)
5068  {
5069  max_ratio = ratio;
5070  index = ax;
5071  }
5072  else if (1.0 / ratio > max_ratio)
5073  {
5074  max_ratio = 1.0 / ratio;
5075  index = next_ax;
5076  }
5077  }
5078  return std::make_pair(index, max_ratio);
5079  }
5080 
5081 
5082  template <int dim, int spacedim>
5083  void
5084  remove_hanging_nodes(Triangulation<dim, spacedim> &tria,
5085  const bool isotropic,
5086  const unsigned int max_iterations)
5087  {
5088  unsigned int iter = 0;
5089  bool continue_refinement = true;
5090 
5091  while (continue_refinement && (iter < max_iterations))
5092  {
5093  if (max_iterations != numbers::invalid_unsigned_int)
5094  iter++;
5095  continue_refinement = false;
5096 
5097  for (const auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
5098  for (const unsigned int j : cell->face_indices())
5099  if (cell->at_boundary(j) == false &&
5100  cell->neighbor(j)->has_children())
5101  {
5102  if (isotropic)
5103  {
5104  cell->set_refine_flag();
5105  continue_refinement = true;
5106  }
5107  else
5108  continue_refinement |= cell->flag_for_face_refinement(j);
5109  }
5110 
5111  tria.execute_coarsening_and_refinement();
5112  }
5113  }
5114 
5115  template <int dim, int spacedim>
5116  void
5117  remove_anisotropy(Triangulation<dim, spacedim> &tria,
5118  const double max_ratio,
5119  const unsigned int max_iterations)
5120  {
5121  unsigned int iter = 0;
5122  bool continue_refinement = true;
5123 
5124  while (continue_refinement && (iter < max_iterations))
5125  {
5126  iter++;
5127  continue_refinement = false;
5128  for (const auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
5129  {
5130  std::pair<unsigned int, double> info =
5131  GridTools::get_longest_direction<dim, spacedim>(cell);
5132  if (info.second > max_ratio)
5133  {
5134  cell->set_refine_flag(
5135  RefinementCase<dim>::cut_axis(info.first));
5136  continue_refinement = true;
5137  }
5138  }
5139  tria.execute_coarsening_and_refinement();
5140  }
5141  }
5142 
5143 
5144  template <int dim, int spacedim>
5145  void
5146  regularize_corner_cells(Triangulation<dim, spacedim> &tria,
5147  const double limit_angle_fraction)
5148  {
5149  if (dim == 1)
5150  return; // Nothing to do
5151 
5152  // Check that we don't have hanging nodes
5153  AssertThrow(!tria.has_hanging_nodes(),
5154  ExcMessage("The input Triangulation cannot "
5155  "have hanging nodes."));
5156 
5157 
5158  bool has_cells_with_more_than_dim_faces_on_boundary = true;
5159  bool has_cells_with_dim_faces_on_boundary = false;
5160 
5161  unsigned int refinement_cycles = 0;
5162 
5163  while (has_cells_with_more_than_dim_faces_on_boundary)
5164  {
5165  has_cells_with_more_than_dim_faces_on_boundary = false;
5166 
5167  for (const auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
5168  {
5169  unsigned int boundary_face_counter = 0;
5170  for (auto f : cell->face_indices())
5171  if (cell->face(f)->at_boundary())
5172  boundary_face_counter++;
5173  if (boundary_face_counter > dim)
5174  {
5175  has_cells_with_more_than_dim_faces_on_boundary = true;
5176  break;
5177  }
5178  else if (boundary_face_counter == dim)
5179  has_cells_with_dim_faces_on_boundary = true;
5180  }
5181  if (has_cells_with_more_than_dim_faces_on_boundary)
5182  {
5183  tria.refine_global(1);
5184  refinement_cycles++;
5185  }
5186  }
5187 
5188  if (has_cells_with_dim_faces_on_boundary)
5189  {
5190  tria.refine_global(1);
5191  refinement_cycles++;
5192  }
5193  else
5194  {
5195  while (refinement_cycles > 0)
5196  {
5197  for (const auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
5198  cell->set_coarsen_flag();
5199  tria.execute_coarsening_and_refinement();
5200  refinement_cycles--;
5201  }
5202  return;
5203  }
5204 
5205  std::vector<bool> cells_to_remove(tria.n_active_cells(), false);
5206  std::vector<Point<spacedim>> vertices = tria.get_vertices();
5207 
5208  std::vector<bool> faces_to_remove(tria.n_raw_faces(), false);
5209 
5210  std::vector<CellData<dim>> cells_to_add;
5211  SubCellData subcelldata_to_add;
5212 
5213  // Trick compiler for dimension independent things
5214  const unsigned int v0 = 0, v1 = 1, v2 = (dim > 1 ? 2 : 0),
5215  v3 = (dim > 1 ? 3 : 0);
5216 
5217  for (const auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
5218  {
5219  double angle_fraction = 0;
5220  unsigned int vertex_at_corner = numbers::invalid_unsigned_int;
5221 
5222  if (dim == 2)
5223  {
5224  Tensor<1, spacedim> p0;
5225  p0[spacedim > 1 ? 1 : 0] = 1;
5226  Tensor<1, spacedim> p1;
5227  p1[0] = 1;
5228 
5229  if (cell->face(v0)->at_boundary() && cell->face(v3)->at_boundary())
5230  {
5231  p0 = cell->vertex(v0) - cell->vertex(v2);
5232  p1 = cell->vertex(v3) - cell->vertex(v2);
5233  vertex_at_corner = v2;
5234  }
5235  else if (cell->face(v3)->at_boundary() &&
5236  cell->face(v1)->at_boundary())
5237  {
5238  p0 = cell->vertex(v2) - cell->vertex(v3);
5239  p1 = cell->vertex(v1) - cell->vertex(v3);
5240  vertex_at_corner = v3;
5241  }
5242  else if (cell->face(1)->at_boundary() &&
5243  cell->face(2)->at_boundary())
5244  {
5245  p0 = cell->vertex(v0) - cell->vertex(v1);
5246  p1 = cell->vertex(v3) - cell->vertex(v1);
5247  vertex_at_corner = v1;
5248  }
5249  else if (cell->face(2)->at_boundary() &&
5250  cell->face(0)->at_boundary())
5251  {
5252  p0 = cell->vertex(v2) - cell->vertex(v0);
5253  p1 = cell->vertex(v1) - cell->vertex(v0);
5254  vertex_at_corner = v0;
5255  }
5256  p0 /= p0.norm();
5257  p1 /= p1.norm();
5258  angle_fraction = std::acos(p0 * p1) / numbers::PI;
5259  }
5260  else
5261  {
5262  Assert(false, ExcNotImplemented());
5263  }
5264 
5265  if (angle_fraction > limit_angle_fraction)
5266  {
5267  auto flags_removal = [&](unsigned int f1,
5268  unsigned int f2,
5269  unsigned int n1,
5270  unsigned int n2) -> void {
5271  cells_to_remove[cell->active_cell_index()] = true;
5272  cells_to_remove[cell->neighbor(n1)->active_cell_index()] = true;
5273  cells_to_remove[cell->neighbor(n2)->active_cell_index()] = true;
5274 
5275  faces_to_remove[cell->face(f1)->index()] = true;
5276  faces_to_remove[cell->face(f2)->index()] = true;
5277 
5278  faces_to_remove[cell->neighbor(n1)->face(f1)->index()] = true;
5279  faces_to_remove[cell->neighbor(n2)->face(f2)->index()] = true;
5280  };
5281 
5282  auto cell_creation = [&](const unsigned int vv0,
5283  const unsigned int vv1,
5284  const unsigned int f0,
5285  const unsigned int f1,
5286 
5287  const unsigned int n0,
5288  const unsigned int v0n0,
5289  const unsigned int v1n0,
5290 
5291  const unsigned int n1,
5292  const unsigned int v0n1,
5293  const unsigned int v1n1) {
5294  CellData<dim> c1, c2;
5295  CellData<1> l1, l2;
5296 
5297  c1.vertices[v0] = cell->vertex_index(vv0);
5298  c1.vertices[v1] = cell->vertex_index(vv1);
5299  c1.vertices[v2] = cell->neighbor(n0)->vertex_index(v0n0);
5300  c1.vertices[v3] = cell->neighbor(n0)->vertex_index(v1n0);
5301 
5302  c1.manifold_id = cell->manifold_id();
5303  c1.material_id = cell->material_id();
5304 
5305  c2.vertices[v0] = cell->vertex_index(vv0);
5306  c2.vertices[v1] = cell->neighbor(n1)->vertex_index(v0n1);
5307  c2.vertices[v2] = cell->vertex_index(vv1);
5308  c2.vertices[v3] = cell->neighbor(n1)->vertex_index(v1n1);
5309 
5310  c2.manifold_id = cell->manifold_id();
5311  c2.material_id = cell->material_id();
5312 
5313  l1.vertices[0] = cell->vertex_index(vv0);
5314  l1.vertices[1] = cell->neighbor(n0)->vertex_index(v0n0);
5315 
5316  l1.boundary_id = cell->line(f0)->boundary_id();
5317  l1.manifold_id = cell->line(f0)->manifold_id();
5318  subcelldata_to_add.boundary_lines.push_back(l1);
5319 
5320  l2.vertices[0] = cell->vertex_index(vv0);
5321  l2.vertices[1] = cell->neighbor(n1)->vertex_index(v0n1);
5322 
5323  l2.boundary_id = cell->line(f1)->boundary_id();
5324  l2.manifold_id = cell->line(f1)->manifold_id();
5325  subcelldata_to_add.boundary_lines.push_back(l2);
5326 
5327  cells_to_add.push_back(c1);
5328  cells_to_add.push_back(c2);
5329  };
5330 
5331  if (dim == 2)
5332  {
5333  switch (vertex_at_corner)
5334  {
5335  case 0:
5336  flags_removal(0, 2, 3, 1);
5337  cell_creation(0, 3, 0, 2, 3, 2, 3, 1, 1, 3);
5338  break;
5339  case 1:
5340  flags_removal(1, 2, 3, 0);
5341  cell_creation(1, 2, 2, 1, 0, 0, 2, 3, 3, 2);
5342  break;
5343  case 2:
5344  flags_removal(3, 0, 1, 2);
5345  cell_creation(2, 1, 3, 0, 1, 3, 1, 2, 0, 1);
5346  break;
5347  case 3:
5348  flags_removal(3, 1, 0, 2);
5349  cell_creation(3, 0, 1, 3, 2, 1, 0, 0, 2, 0);
5350  break;
5351  }
5352  }
5353  else
5354  {
5355  Assert(false, ExcNotImplemented());
5356  }
5357  }
5358  }
5359 
5360  // if no cells need to be added, then no regularization is necessary.
5361  // Restore things as they were before this function was called.
5362  if (cells_to_add.size() == 0)
5363  {
5364  while (refinement_cycles > 0)
5365  {
5366  for (const auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
5367  cell->set_coarsen_flag();
5368  tria.execute_coarsening_and_refinement();
5369  refinement_cycles--;
5370  }
5371  return;
5372  }
5373 
5374  // add the cells that were not marked as skipped
5375  for (const auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
5376  {
5377  if (cells_to_remove[cell->active_cell_index()] == false)
5378  {
5379  CellData<dim> c;
5380  for (const unsigned int v : cell->vertex_indices())
5381  c.vertices[v] = cell->vertex_index(v);
5382  c.manifold_id = cell->manifold_id();
5383  c.material_id = cell->material_id();
5384  cells_to_add.push_back(c);
5385  }
5386  }
5387 
5388  // Face counter for both dim == 2 and dim == 3
5389  typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_face_iterator
5390  face = tria.begin_active_face(),
5391  endf = tria.end_face();
5392  for (; face != endf; ++face)
5393  if ((face->at_boundary() ||
5394  face->manifold_id() != numbers::flat_manifold_id) &&
5395  faces_to_remove[face->index()] == false)
5396  {
5397  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < face->n_lines(); ++l)
5398  {
5399  CellData<1> line;
5400  if (dim == 2)
5401  {
5402  for (const unsigned int v : face->vertex_indices())
5403  line.vertices[v] = face->vertex_index(v);
5404  line.boundary_id = face->boundary_id();
5405  line.manifold_id = face->manifold_id();
5406  }
5407  else
5408  {
5409  for (const unsigned int v : face->line(l)->vertex_indices())
5410  line.vertices[v] = face->line(l)->vertex_index(v);
5411  line.boundary_id = face->line(l)->boundary_id();
5412  line.manifold_id = face->line(l)->manifold_id();
5413  }
5414  subcelldata_to_add.boundary_lines.push_back(line);
5415  }
5416  if (dim == 3)
5417  {
5418  CellData<2> quad;
5419  for (const unsigned int v : face->vertex_indices())
5420  quad.vertices[v] = face->vertex_index(v);
5421  quad.boundary_id = face->boundary_id();
5422  quad.manifold_id = face->manifold_id();
5423  subcelldata_to_add.boundary_quads.push_back(quad);
5424  }
5425  }
5426  GridTools::delete_unused_vertices(vertices,
5427  cells_to_add,
5428  subcelldata_to_add);
5429  GridTools::consistently_order_cells(cells_to_add);
5430 
5431  // Save manifolds
5432  auto manifold_ids = tria.get_manifold_ids();
5433  std::map<types::manifold_id, std::unique_ptr<Manifold<dim, spacedim>>>
5434  manifolds;
5435  // Set manifolds in new Triangulation
5436  for (const auto manifold_id : manifold_ids)
5437  if (manifold_id != numbers::flat_manifold_id)
5438  manifolds[manifold_id] = tria.get_manifold(manifold_id).clone();
5439 
5440  tria.clear();
5441 
5442  tria.create_triangulation(vertices, cells_to_add, subcelldata_to_add);
5443 
5444  // Restore manifolds
5445  for (const auto manifold_id : manifold_ids)
5446  if (manifold_id != numbers::flat_manifold_id)
5447  tria.set_manifold(manifold_id, *manifolds[manifold_id]);
5448  }
5449 
5450 
5451 
5452  template <int dim, int spacedim>
5453 #ifndef DOXYGEN
5454  std::tuple<
5455  std::vector<typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator>,
5456  std::vector<std::vector<Point<dim>>>,
5457  std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int>>>
5458 #else
5459  return_type
5460 #endif
5461  compute_point_locations(
5462  const Cache<dim, spacedim> & cache,
5463  const std::vector<Point<spacedim>> &points,
5464  const typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator
5465  &cell_hint)
5466  {
5467  const auto cqmp = compute_point_locations_try_all(cache, points, cell_hint);
5468  // Splitting the tuple's components
5469  auto &cells = std::get<0>(cqmp);
5470  auto &qpoints = std::get<1>(cqmp);
5471  auto &maps = std::get<2>(cqmp);
5472 
5473  return std::make_tuple(std::move(cells),
5474  std::move(qpoints),
5475  std::move(maps));
5476  }
5477 
5478 
5479 
5480  template <int dim, int spacedim>
5481 #ifndef DOXYGEN
5482  std::tuple<
5483  std::vector<typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator>,
5484  std::vector<std::vector<Point<dim>>>,
5485  std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int>>,
5486  std::vector<unsigned int>>
5487 #else
5488  return_type
5489 #endif
5490  compute_point_locations_try_all(
5491  const Cache<dim, spacedim> & cache,
5492  const std::vector<Point<spacedim>> &points,
5493  const typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator
5494  &cell_hint)
5495  {
5496  Assert((dim == spacedim),
5497  ExcMessage("Only implemented for dim==spacedim."));
5498 
5499  // Alias
5500  namespace bgi = boost::geometry::index;
5501 
5502  // Get the mapping
5503  const auto &mapping = cache.get_mapping();
5504 
5505  // How many points are here?
5506  const unsigned int np = points.size();
5507 
5508  std::vector<typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator>
5509  cells_out;
5510  std::vector<std::vector<Point<dim>>> qpoints_out;
5511  std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int>> maps_out;
5512  std::vector<unsigned int> missing_points_out;
5513 
5514  // Now the easy case.
5515  if (np == 0)
5516  return std::make_tuple(std::move(cells_out),
5517  std::move(qpoints_out),
5518  std::move(maps_out),
5519  std::move(missing_points_out));
5520 
5521  // For the search we shall use the following tree
5522  const auto &b_tree = cache.get_cell_bounding_boxes_rtree();
5523 
5524  // Now make a tree of indices for the points
5525  // [TODO] This would work better with pack_rtree_of_indices, but
5526  // windows does not like it. Build a tree with pairs of point and id
5527  std::vector<std::pair<Point<spacedim>, unsigned int>> points_and_ids(np);
5528  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < np; ++i)
5529  points_and_ids[i] = std::make_pair(points[i], i);
5530  const auto p_tree = pack_rtree(points_and_ids);
5531 
5532  // Keep track of all found points
5533  std::vector<bool> found_points(points.size(), false);
5534 
5535  // Check if a point was found
5536  const auto already_found = [&found_points](const auto &id) {
5537  AssertIndexRange(id.second, found_points.size());
5538  return found_points[id.second];
5539  };
5540 
5541  // check if the given cell was already in the vector of cells before. If so,
5542  // insert in the corresponding vectors the reference point and the id.
5543  // Otherwise append a new entry to all vectors.
5544  const auto store_cell_point_and_id =
5545  [&](
5546  const typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator &cell,
5547  const Point<dim> & ref_point,
5548  const unsigned int &id) {
5549  const auto it = std::find(cells_out.rbegin(), cells_out.rend(), cell);
5550  if (it != cells_out.rend())
5551  {
5552  const auto cell_id =
5553  (cells_out.size() - 1 - (it - cells_out.rbegin()));
5554  qpoints_out[cell_id].emplace_back(ref_point);
5555  maps_out[cell_id].emplace_back(id);
5556  }
5557  else
5558  {
5559  cells_out.emplace_back(cell);
5560  qpoints_out.emplace_back(std::vector<Point<dim>>({ref_point}));
5561  maps_out.emplace_back(std::vector<unsigned int>({id}));
5562  }
5563  };
5564 
5565  // Check all points within a given pair of box and cell
5566  const auto check_all_points_within_box = [&](const auto &leaf) {
5567  const auto &box = leaf.first;
5568  const auto &cell_hint = leaf.second;
5569 
5570  for (const auto &point_and_id :
5571  p_tree | bgi::adaptors::queried(!bgi::satisfies(already_found) &&
5572  bgi::intersects(box)))
5573  {
5574  const auto id = point_and_id.second;
5575  const auto cell_and_ref =
5576  GridTools::find_active_cell_around_point(cache,
5577  points[id],
5578  cell_hint);
5579  const auto &cell = cell_and_ref.first;
5580  const auto &ref_point = cell_and_ref.second;
5581 
5582  if (cell.state() == IteratorState::valid)
5583  store_cell_point_and_id(cell, ref_point, id);
5584  else
5585  missing_points_out.emplace_back(id);
5586 
5587  // Don't look anymore for this point
5588  found_points[id] = true;
5589  }
5590  };
5591 
5592  // If a hint cell was given, use it
5593  if (cell_hint.state() == IteratorState::valid)
5594  check_all_points_within_box(
5595  std::make_pair(mapping.get_bounding_box(cell_hint), cell_hint));
5596 
5597  // Now loop over all points that have not been found yet
5598  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < np; ++i)
5599  if (found_points[i] == false)
5600  {
5601  // Get the closest cell to this point
5602  const auto leaf = b_tree.qbegin(bgi::nearest(points[i], 1));
5603  // Now checks all points that fall within this box
5604  if (leaf != b_tree.qend())
5605  check_all_points_within_box(*leaf);
5606  else
5607  {
5608  // We should not get here. Throw an error.
5609  Assert(false, ExcInternalError());
5610  }
5611  }
5612  // Now make sure we send out the rest of the points that we did not find.
5613  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < np; ++i)
5614  if (found_points[i] == false)
5615  missing_points_out.emplace_back(i);
5616 
5617  // Debug Checking
5618  AssertDimension(cells_out.size(), maps_out.size());
5619  AssertDimension(cells_out.size(), qpoints_out.size());
5620 
5621 #ifdef DEBUG
5622  unsigned int c = cells_out.size();
5623  unsigned int qps = 0;
5624  // The number of points in all
5625  // the cells must be the same as
5626  // the number of points we
5627  // started off from,
5628  // plus the points which were ignored
5629  for (unsigned int n = 0; n < c; ++n)
5630  {
5631  AssertDimension(qpoints_out[n].size(), maps_out[n].size());
5632  qps += qpoints_out[n].size();
5633  }
5634 
5635  Assert(qps + missing_points_out.size() == np,
5636  ExcDimensionMismatch(qps + missing_points_out.size(), np));
5637 #endif
5638 
5639  return std::make_tuple(std::move(cells_out),
5640  std::move(qpoints_out),
5641  std::move(maps_out),
5642  std::move(missing_points_out));
5643  }
5644 
5645 
5646 
5647  template <int dim, int spacedim>
5648 #ifndef DOXYGEN
5649  std::tuple<
5650  std::vector<typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator>,
5651  std::vector<std::vector<Point<dim>>>,
5652  std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int>>,
5653  std::vector<std::vector<Point<spacedim>>>,
5654  std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int>>>
5655 #else
5656  return_type
5657 #endif
5658  distributed_compute_point_locations(
5659  const GridTools::Cache<dim, spacedim> & cache,
5660  const std::vector<Point<spacedim>> & points,
5661  const std::vector<std::vector<BoundingBox<spacedim>>> &global_bboxes,
5662  const double tolerance)
5663  {
5664  // run internal function ...
5665  const auto all = internal::distributed_compute_point_locations(
5666  cache, points, global_bboxes, tolerance, false)
5667  .send_components;
5668 
5669  // ... and reshuffle the data
5670  std::tuple<
5671  std::vector<typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator>,
5672  std::vector<std::vector<Point<dim>>>,
5673  std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int>>,
5674  std::vector<std::vector<Point<spacedim>>>,
5675  std::vector<std::vector<unsigned int>>>
5676  result;
5677 
5678  std::pair<int, int> dummy{-1, -1};
5679 
5680  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < all.size(); ++i)
5681  {
5682  if (dummy != std::get<0>(all[i]))
5683  {
5684  std::get<0>(result).push_back(
5685  typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator{
5686  &cache.get_triangulation(),
5687  std::get<0>(all[i]).first,
5688  std::get<0>(all[i]).second});
5689 
5690  const unsigned int new_size = std::get<0>(result).size();
5691 
5692  std::get<1>(result).resize(new_size);
5693  std::get<2>(result).resize(new_size);
5694  std::get<3>(result).resize(new_size);
5695  std::get<4>(result).resize(new_size);
5696 
5697  dummy = std::get<0>(all[i]);
5698  }
5699 
5700  std::get<1>(result).back().push_back(
5701  std::get<3>(all[i])); // reference point
5702  std::get<2>(result).back().push_back(std::get<2>(all[i])); // index
5703  std::get<3>(result).back().push_back(std::get<4>(all[i])); // real point
5704  std::get<4>(result).back().push_back(std::get<1>(all[i])); // rank
5705  }
5706 
5707  return result;
5708  }
5709 
5710 
5711 
5712  namespace internal
5713  {
5714  template <int spacedim>
5715  std::tuple<std::vector<unsigned int>,
5716  std::vector<unsigned int>,
5717  std::vector<unsigned int>>
5718  guess_point_owner(
5719  const std::vector<std::vector<BoundingBox<spacedim>>> &global_bboxes,
5720  const std::vector<Point<spacedim>> & points)
5721  {
5722  std::vector<std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int>> ranks_and_indices;
5723  ranks_and_indices.reserve(points.size());
5724 
5725  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < points.size(); ++i)
5726  {
5727  const auto &point = points[i];
5728  for (unsigned rank = 0; rank < global_bboxes.size(); ++rank)
5729  for (const auto &box : global_bboxes[rank])
5730  if (box.point_inside(point))
5731  {
5732  ranks_and_indices.emplace_back(rank, i);
5733  break;
5734  }
5735  }
5736 
5737  // convert to CRS
5738  std::sort(ranks_and_indices.begin(), ranks_and_indices.end());
5739 
5740  std::vector<unsigned int> ranks;
5741  std::vector<unsigned int> ptr;
5742  std::vector<unsigned int> indices;
5743 
5744  unsigned int dummy_rank = numbers::invalid_unsigned_int;
5745 
5746  for (const auto &i : ranks_and_indices)
5747  {
5748  if (dummy_rank != i.first)
5749  {
5750  dummy_rank = i.first;
5751  ranks.push_back(dummy_rank);
5752  ptr.push_back(indices.size());
5753  }
5754 
5755  indices.push_back(i.second);
5756  }
5757  ptr.push_back(indices.size());
5758 
5759  return std::make_tuple(std::move(ranks),
5760  std::move(ptr),
5761  std::move(indices));
5762  }
5763 
5764 
5765 
5766  template <int dim, int spacedim>
5767  std::vector<
5768  std::pair<typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator,
5769  Point<dim>>>
5770  find_all_locally_owned_active_cells_around_point(
5771  const Cache<dim, spacedim> & cache,
5772  const Point<spacedim> & point,
5773  typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator &cell_hint,
5774  const std::vector<bool> &marked_vertices,
5775  const double tolerance)
5776  {
5777  std::vector<
5778  std::pair<typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator,
5779  Point<dim>>>
5780  locally_owned_active_cells_around_point;
5781 
5782  const auto first_cell = GridTools::find_active_cell_around_point(
5783  cache.get_mapping(),
5784  cache.get_triangulation(),
5785  point,
5786  cache.get_vertex_to_cell_map(),
5787  cache.get_vertex_to_cell_centers_directions(),
5788  cell_hint,
5789  marked_vertices,
5790  cache.get_used_vertices_rtree(),
5791  tolerance,
5792  &cache.get_locally_owned_cell_bounding_boxes_rtree());
5793 
5794  cell_hint = first_cell.first;
5795  if (cell_hint.state() == IteratorState::valid)
5796  {
5797  const auto active_cells_around_point =
5798  GridTools::find_all_active_cells_around_point(
5799  cache.get_mapping(),
5800  cache.get_triangulation(),
5801  point,
5802  tolerance,
5803  first_cell);
5804 
5805  locally_owned_active_cells_around_point.reserve(
5806  active_cells_around_point.size());
5807 
5808  for (const auto &cell : active_cells_around_point)
5809  if (cell.first->is_locally_owned())
5810  locally_owned_active_cells_around_point.push_back(cell);
5811  }
5812 
5813  std::sort(locally_owned_active_cells_around_point.begin(),
5814  locally_owned_active_cells_around_point.end(),
5815  [](const auto &a, const auto &b) { return a.first < b.first; });
5816 
5817  return locally_owned_active_cells_around_point;
5818  }
5819 
5820 
5821 
5822  template <int dim, int spacedim>
5823  DistributedComputePointLocationsInternal<dim, spacedim>
5824  distributed_compute_point_locations(
5825  const GridTools::Cache<dim, spacedim> & cache,
5826  const std::vector<Point<spacedim>> & points,
5827  const std::vector<std::vector<BoundingBox<spacedim>>> &global_bboxes,
5828  const double tolerance,
5829  const bool perform_handshake,
5830  const bool enforce_unique_mapping)
5831  {
5832  Assert(!enforce_unique_mapping || perform_handshake, ExcInternalError());
5833 
5834  DistributedComputePointLocationsInternal<dim, spacedim> result;
5835 
5836  auto &send_components = result.send_components;
5837  auto &send_ranks = result.send_ranks;
5838  auto &send_ptrs = result.send_ptrs;
5839  auto &recv_components = result.recv_components;
5840  auto &recv_ranks = result.recv_ranks;
5841  auto &recv_ptrs = result.recv_ptrs;
5842 
5843  const auto potential_owners =
5844  internal::guess_point_owner(global_bboxes, points);
5845 
5846  const auto &potential_owners_ranks = std::get<0>(potential_owners);
5847  const auto &potential_owners_ptrs = std::get<1>(potential_owners);
5848  const auto &potential_owners_indices = std::get<2>(potential_owners);
5849 
5850  const std::vector<bool> marked_vertices;
5851  auto cell_hint = cache.get_triangulation().begin_active();
5852 
5853  const auto translate = [&](const unsigned int other_rank) {
5854  const auto ptr = std::find(potential_owners_ranks.begin(),
5855  potential_owners_ranks.end(),
5856  other_rank);
5857 
5858  Assert(ptr != potential_owners_ranks.end(), ExcInternalError());
5859 
5860  const auto other_rank_index =
5861  std::distance(potential_owners_ranks.begin(), ptr);
5862 
5863  return other_rank_index;
5864  };
5865 
5866  Utilities::MPI::ConsensusAlgorithms::AnonymousProcess<char, char> process(
5867  [&]() { return potential_owners_ranks; },
5868  [&](const unsigned int other_rank, std::vector<char> &send_buffer) {
5869  const auto other_rank_index = translate(other_rank);
5870 
5871  std::vector<std::pair<unsigned int, Point<spacedim>>> temp;
5872  temp.reserve(potential_owners_ptrs[other_rank_index + 1] -
5873  potential_owners_ptrs[other_rank_index]);
5874 
5875  for (unsigned int i = potential_owners_ptrs[other_rank_index];
5876  i < potential_owners_ptrs[other_rank_index + 1];
5877  ++i)
5878  temp.emplace_back(potential_owners_indices[i],
5879  points[potential_owners_indices[i]]);
5880 
5881  send_buffer = Utilities::pack(temp, false);
5882  },
5883  [&](const unsigned int & other_rank,
5884  const std::vector<char> &recv_buffer,
5885  std::vector<char> & request_buffer) {
5886  const auto recv_buffer_unpacked = Utilities::unpack<
5887  std::vector<std::pair<unsigned int, Point<spacedim>>>>(recv_buffer,
5888  false);
5889 
5890  std::vector<unsigned int> request_buffer_temp(
5891  recv_buffer_unpacked.size(), 0);
5892 
5893  cell_hint = cache.get_triangulation().begin_active();
5894 
5895  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < recv_buffer_unpacked.size(); ++i)
5896  {
5897  const auto &index_and_point = recv_buffer_unpacked[i];
5898 
5899  const auto cells_and_reference_positions =
5900  find_all_locally_owned_active_cells_around_point(
5901  cache,
5902  index_and_point.second,
5903  cell_hint,
5904  marked_vertices,
5905  tolerance);
5906 
5907  for (const auto &cell_and_reference_position :
5908  cells_and_reference_positions)
5909  {
5910  send_components.emplace_back(
5911  std::pair<int, int>(
5912  cell_and_reference_position.first->level(),
5913  cell_and_reference_position.first->index()),
5914  other_rank,
5915  index_and_point.first,
5916  cell_and_reference_position.second,
5917  index_and_point.second,
5918  numbers::invalid_unsigned_int);
5919 
5920  if (enforce_unique_mapping)
5921  break; // in the case of unique mapping, we only need a
5922  // single cell (we take the first)
5923  }
5924 
5925  if (perform_handshake)
5926  request_buffer_temp[i] =
5927  enforce_unique_mapping ?
5928  std::min<unsigned int>(
5929  1, cells_and_reference_positions.size()) :
5930  cells_and_reference_positions.size();
5931  }
5932 
5933  if (perform_handshake)
5934  request_buffer = Utilities::pack(request_buffer_temp, false);
5935  },
5936  [&](const unsigned int other_rank, std::vector<char> &recv_buffer) {
5937  if (perform_handshake)
5938  {
5939  const auto other_rank_index = translate(other_rank);
5940 
5941  recv_buffer =
5942  Utilities::pack(std::vector<unsigned int>(
5943  potential_owners_ptrs[other_rank_index + 1] -
5944  potential_owners_ptrs[other_rank_index]),
5945  false);
5946  }
5947  },
5948  [&](const unsigned int other_rank,
5949  const std::vector<char> &recv_buffer) {
5950  if (perform_handshake)
5951  {
5952  const auto recv_buffer_unpacked =
5953  Utilities::unpack<std::vector<unsigned int>>(recv_buffer,
5954  false);
5955 
5956  const auto other_rank_index = translate(other_rank);
5957 
5958  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < recv_buffer_unpacked.size(); ++i)
5959  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < recv_buffer_unpacked[i]; ++j)
5960  recv_components.emplace_back(
5961  other_rank,
5962  potential_owners_indices
5963  [i + potential_owners_ptrs[other_rank_index]],
5964  numbers::invalid_unsigned_int);
5965  }
5966  });
5967 
5968  Utilities::MPI::ConsensusAlgorithms::Selector<char, char>(
5969  process, cache.get_triangulation().get_communicator())
5970  .run();
5971 
5972  // for unique mapping, we need to modify recv_components and
5973  // send_components consistently
5974  if (enforce_unique_mapping)
5975  {
5976  std::vector<unsigned int> mask_recv(recv_components.size());
5977  std::vector<unsigned int> mask_send(send_components.size());
5978 
5979  // set up new recv_components and monitor which entries (we keep
5980  // the entry of the lowest rank) have been eliminated so that we can
5981  // communicate it
5982  auto recv_components_copy = recv_components;
5983  recv_components.clear();
5984 
5985  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < recv_components_copy.size(); ++i)
5986  std::get<2>(recv_components_copy[i]) = i;
5987 
5988  std::sort(recv_components_copy.begin(),
5989  recv_components_copy.end(),
5990  [&](const auto &a, const auto &b) {
5991  if (std::get<0>(a) != std::get<0>(b)) // rank
5992  return std::get<0>(a) < std::get<0>(b);
5993 
5994  return std::get<2>(a) < std::get<2>(b); // enumeration
5995  });
5996 
5997  std::vector<bool> unique(points.size(), false);
5998 
5999  std::vector<unsigned int> recv_ranks;
6000  std::vector<unsigned int> recv_ptrs;
6001 
6002  for (unsigned int i = 0, dummy = numbers::invalid_unsigned_int;
6003  i < recv_components_copy.size();
6004  ++i)
6005  {
6006  if (dummy != std::get<0>(recv_components_copy[i]))
6007  {
6008  dummy = std::get<0>(recv_components_copy[i]);
6009  recv_ranks.push_back(dummy);
6010  recv_ptrs.push_back(i);
6011  }
6012 
6013  if (unique[std::get<1>(recv_components_copy[i])] == false)
6014  {
6015  recv_components.emplace_back(recv_components_copy[i]);
6016  mask_recv[i] = 1;
6017  unique[std::get<1>(recv_components_copy[i])] = true;
6018  }
6019  else
6020  {
6021  mask_recv[i] = 0;
6022  }
6023  }
6024  recv_ptrs.push_back(recv_components_copy.size());
6025 
6026  Assert(std::all_of(unique.begin(),
6027  unique.end(),
6028  [](const auto &v) { return v; }),
6029  ExcInternalError());
6030 
6031 
6032  // prepare send_components so that not needed entries can be
6033  // eliminated later on
6034  auto send_components_copy = send_components;
6035  send_components.clear();
6036 
6037  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < send_components_copy.size(); ++i)
6038  std::get<5>(send_components_copy[i]) = i;
6039 
6040  std::sort(send_components_copy.begin(),
6041  send_components_copy.end(),
6042  [&](const auto &a, const auto &b) {
6043  if (std::get<1>(a) != std::get<1>(b)) // rank
6044  return std::get<1>(a) < std::get<1>(b);
6045 
6046  return std::get<5>(a) < std::get<5>(b); // enumeration
6047  });
6048 
6049  std::vector<unsigned int> send_ranks;
6050  std::vector<unsigned int> send_ptrs;
6051 
6052  for (unsigned int i = 0, dummy = numbers::invalid_unsigned_int;
6053  i < send_components_copy.size();
6054  ++i)
6055  {
6056  if (dummy != std::get<1>(send_components_copy[i]))
6057  {
6058  dummy = std::get<1>(send_components_copy[i]);
6059  send_ranks.push_back(dummy);
6060  send_ptrs.push_back(i);
6061  }
6062  }
6063  send_ptrs.push_back(send_components_copy.size());
6064 
6065  // perform communication
6066 #ifdef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6067  std::vector<MPI_Request> req(send_ranks.size() + recv_ranks.size());
6068 
6069  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < send_ranks.size(); ++i)
6070  {
6071  const auto ierr =
6072  MPI_Irecv(mask_send.data() + send_ptrs[i],
6073  send_ptrs[i + 1] - send_ptrs[i],
6074  MPI_UNSIGNED,
6075  send_ranks[i],
6076  Utilities::MPI::internal::Tags::
6077  distributed_compute_point_locations,
6078  cache.get_triangulation().get_communicator(),
6079  &req[i]);
6080  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6081  }
6082 
6083  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < recv_ranks.size(); ++i)
6084  {
6085  const auto ierr =
6086  MPI_Isend(mask_recv.data() + recv_ptrs[i],
6087  recv_ptrs[i + 1] - recv_ptrs[i],
6088  MPI_UNSIGNED,
6089  recv_ranks[i],
6090  Utilities::MPI::internal::Tags::
6091  distributed_compute_point_locations,
6092  cache.get_triangulation().get_communicator(),
6093  &req[i] + send_ranks.size());
6094  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6095  }
6096 
6097  auto ierr = MPI_Waitall(req.size(), req.data(), MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE);
6098  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6099 #else
6100  mask_send = mask_recv;
6101 #endif
6102 
6103  // eliminate not needed entries
6104  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < send_components_copy.size(); ++i)
6105  if (mask_send[i] == 1)
6106  send_components.emplace_back(send_components_copy[i]);
6107  }
6108 
6109  if (true)
6110  {
6111  // sort according to rank (and point index and cell) -> make
6112  // deterministic
6113  std::sort(send_components.begin(),
6114  send_components.end(),
6115  [&](const auto &a, const auto &b) {
6116  if (std::get<1>(a) != std::get<1>(b)) // rank
6117  return std::get<1>(a) < std::get<1>(b);
6118 
6119  if (std::get<2>(a) != std::get<2>(b)) // point index
6120  return std::get<2>(a) < std::get<2>(b);
6121 
6122  return std::get<0>(a) < std::get<0>(b); // cell
6123  });
6124 
6125  // perform enumeration and extract rank information
6126  for (unsigned int i = 0, dummy = numbers::invalid_unsigned_int;
6127  i < send_components.size();
6128  ++i)
6129  {
6130  std::get<5>(send_components[i]) = i;
6131 
6132  if (dummy != std::get<1>(send_components[i]))
6133  {
6134  dummy = std::get<1>(send_components[i]);
6135  send_ranks.push_back(dummy);
6136  send_ptrs.push_back(i);
6137  }
6138  }
6139  send_ptrs.push_back(send_components.size());
6140 
6141  // sort according to cell, rank, point index (while keeping
6142  // partial ordering)
6143  std::sort(send_components.begin(),
6144  send_components.end(),
6145  [&](const auto &a, const auto &b) {
6146  if (std::get<0>(a) != std::get<0>(b))
6147  return std::get<0>(a) < std::get<0>(b); // cell
6148 
6149  if (std::get<1>(a) != std::get<1>(b))
6150  return std::get<1>(a) < std::get<1>(b); // rank
6151 
6152  if (std::get<2>(a) != std::get<2>(b))
6153  return std::get<2>(a) < std::get<2>(b); // point index
6154 
6155  return std::get<5>(a) < std::get<5>(b); // enumeration
6156  });
6157  }
6158 
6159  if (perform_handshake)
6160  {
6161  // sort according to rank (and point index) -> make deterministic
6162  std::sort(recv_components.begin(),
6163  recv_components.end(),
6164  [&](const auto &a, const auto &b) {
6165  if (std::get<0>(a) != std::get<0>(b))
6166  return std::get<0>(a) < std::get<0>(b); // rank
6167 
6168  return std::get<1>(a) < std::get<1>(b); // point index
6169  });
6170 
6171  // perform enumeration and extract rank information
6172  for (unsigned int i = 0, dummy = numbers::invalid_unsigned_int;
6173  i < recv_components.size();
6174  ++i)
6175  {
6176  std::get<2>(recv_components[i]) = i;
6177 
6178  if (dummy != std::get<0>(recv_components[i]))
6179  {
6180  dummy = std::get<0>(recv_components[i]);
6181  recv_ranks.push_back(dummy);
6182  recv_ptrs.push_back(i);
6183  }
6184  }
6185  recv_ptrs.push_back(recv_components.size());
6186 
6187  // sort according to point index and rank (while keeping partial
6188  // ordering)
6189  std::sort(recv_components.begin(),
6190  recv_components.end(),
6191  [&](const auto &a, const auto &b) {
6192  if (std::get<1>(a) != std::get<1>(b))
6193  return std::get<1>(a) < std::get<1>(b); // point index
6194 
6195  if (std::get<0>(a) != std::get<0>(b))
6196  return std::get<0>(a) < std::get<0>(b); // rank
6197 
6198  return std::get<2>(a) < std::get<2>(b); // enumeration
6199  });
6200  }
6201 
6202  return result;
6203  }
6204  } // namespace internal
6205 
6206 
6207 
6208  template <int dim, int spacedim>
6209  std::map<unsigned int, Point<spacedim>>
6210  extract_used_vertices(const Triangulation<dim, spacedim> &container,
6211  const Mapping<dim, spacedim> & mapping)
6212  {
6213  std::map<unsigned int, Point<spacedim>> result;
6214  for (const auto &cell : container.active_cell_iterators())
6215  {
6216  if (!cell->is_artificial())
6217  {
6218  const auto vs = mapping.get_vertices(cell);
6219  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vs.size(); ++i)
6220  result[cell->vertex_index(i)] = vs[i];
6221  }
6222  }
6223  return result;
6224  }
6225 
6226 
6227  template <int spacedim>
6228  unsigned int
6229  find_closest_vertex(const std::map<unsigned int, Point<spacedim>> &vertices,
6230  const Point<spacedim> & p)
6231  {
6232  auto id_and_v = std::min_element(
6233  vertices.begin(),
6234  vertices.end(),
6235  [&](const std::pair<const unsigned int, Point<spacedim>> &p1,
6236  const std::pair<const unsigned int, Point<spacedim>> &p2) -> bool {
6237  return p1.second.distance(p) < p2.second.distance(p);
6238  });
6239  return id_and_v->first;
6240  }
6241 
6242 
6243  template <int dim, int spacedim>
6244  std::pair<typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator,
6245  Point<dim>>
6246  find_active_cell_around_point(
6247  const Cache<dim, spacedim> &cache,
6248  const Point<spacedim> & p,
6249  const typename Triangulation<dim, spacedim>::active_cell_iterator
6250  & cell_hint,
6251  const std::vector<bool> &marked_vertices,
6252  const double tolerance)
6253  {
6254  const auto &mesh = cache.get_triangulation();
6255  const auto &mapping = cache.get_mapping();
6256  const auto &vertex_to_cells = cache.get_vertex_to_cell_map();
6257  const auto &vertex_to_cell_centers =
6258  cache.get_vertex_to_cell_centers_directions();
6259  const auto &used_vertices_rtree = cache.get_used_vertices_rtree();
6260 
6261  return find_active_cell_around_point(mapping,
6262  mesh,
6263  p,
6264  vertex_to_cells,
6265  vertex_to_cell_centers,
6266  cell_hint,
6267  marked_vertices,
6268  used_vertices_rtree,
6269  tolerance);
6270  }
6271 
6272  template <int spacedim>
6273  std::vector<std::vector<BoundingBox<spacedim>>>
6274  exchange_local_bounding_boxes(
6275  const std::vector<BoundingBox<spacedim>> &local_bboxes,
6276  const MPI_Comm & mpi_communicator)
6277  {
6278 #ifndef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6279  (void)local_bboxes;
6280  (void)mpi_communicator;
6281  Assert(false,
6282  ExcMessage(
6283  "GridTools::exchange_local_bounding_boxes() requires MPI."));
6284  return {};
6285 #else
6286  // Step 1: preparing data to be sent
6287  unsigned int n_bboxes = local_bboxes.size();
6288  // Dimension of the array to be exchanged (number of double)
6289  int n_local_data = 2 * spacedim * n_bboxes;
6290  // data array stores each entry of each point describing the bounding boxes
6291  std::vector<double> loc_data_array(n_local_data);
6292  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_bboxes; ++i)
6293  for (unsigned int d = 0; d < spacedim; ++d)
6294  {
6295  // Extracting the coordinates of each boundary point
6296  loc_data_array[2 * i * spacedim + d] =
6297  local_bboxes[i].get_boundary_points().first[d];
6298  loc_data_array[2 * i * spacedim + spacedim + d] =
6299  local_bboxes[i].get_boundary_points().second[d];
6300  }
6301 
6302  // Step 2: exchanging the size of local data
6303  unsigned int n_procs = Utilities::MPI::n_mpi_processes(mpi_communicator);
6304 
6305  // Vector to store the size of loc_data_array for every process
6306  std::vector<int> size_all_data(n_procs);
6307 
6308  // Exchanging the number of bboxes
6309  int ierr = MPI_Allgather(&n_local_data,
6310  1,
6311  MPI_INT,
6312  size_all_data.data(),
6313  1,
6314  MPI_INT,
6315  mpi_communicator);
6316  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6317 
6318  // Now computing the the displacement, relative to recvbuf,
6319  // at which to store the incoming data
6320  std::vector<int> rdispls(n_procs);
6321  rdispls[0] = 0;
6322  for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_procs; ++i)
6323  rdispls[i] = rdispls[i - 1] + size_all_data[i - 1];
6324 
6325  // Step 3: exchange the data and bounding boxes:
6326  // Allocating a vector to contain all the received data
6327  std::vector<double> data_array(rdispls.back() + size_all_data.back());
6328 
6329  ierr = MPI_Allgatherv(loc_data_array.data(),
6330  n_local_data,
6331  MPI_DOUBLE,
6332  data_array.data(),
6333  size_all_data.data(),
6334  rdispls.data(),
6335  MPI_DOUBLE,
6336  mpi_communicator);
6337  AssertThrowMPI(ierr);
6338 
6339  // Step 4: create the array of bboxes for output
6340  std::vector<std::vector<BoundingBox<spacedim>>> global_bboxes(n_procs);
6341  unsigned int begin_idx = 0;
6342  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_procs; ++i)
6343  {
6344  // Number of local bounding boxes
6345  unsigned int n_bbox_i = size_all_data[i] / (spacedim * 2);
6346  global_bboxes[i].resize(n_bbox_i);
6347  for (unsigned int bbox = 0; bbox < n_bbox_i; ++bbox)
6348  {
6349  Point<spacedim> p1, p2; // boundary points for bbox
6350  for (unsigned int d = 0; d < spacedim; ++d)
6351  {
6352  p1[d] = data_array[begin_idx + 2 * bbox * spacedim + d];
6353  p2[d] =
6354  data_array[begin_idx + 2 * bbox * spacedim + spacedim + d];
6355  }
6356  BoundingBox<spacedim> loc_bbox(std::make_pair(p1, p2));
6357  global_bboxes[i][bbox] = loc_bbox;
6358  }
6359  // Shifting the first index to the start of the next vector
6360  begin_idx += size_all_data[i];
6361  }
6362  return global_bboxes;
6363 #endif // DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6364  }
6365 
6366 
6367 
6368  template <int spacedim>
6369  RTree<std::pair<BoundingBox<spacedim>, unsigned int>>
6370  build_global_description_tree(
6371  const std::vector<BoundingBox<spacedim>> &local_description,
6372  const MPI_Comm & mpi_communicator)
6373  {
6374 #ifndef DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6375  (void)mpi_communicator;
6376  // Building a tree with the only boxes available without MPI
6377  std::vector<std::pair<BoundingBox<spacedim>, unsigned int>> boxes_index(
6378  local_description.size());
6379  // Adding to each box the rank of the process owning it
6380  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < local_description.size(); ++i)
6381  boxes_index[i] = std::make_pair(local_description[i], 0u);
6382  return pack_rtree(boxes_index);
6383 #else
6384  // Exchanging local bounding boxes
6385  const std::vector<std::vector<BoundingBox<spacedim>>> global_bboxes =
6386  Utilities::MPI::all_gather(mpi_communicator, local_description);
6387 
6388  // Preparing to flatten the vector
6389  const unsigned int n_procs =
6390  Utilities::MPI::n_mpi_processes(mpi_communicator);
6391  // The i'th element of the following vector contains the index of the first
6392  // local bounding box from the process of rank i
6393  std::vector<unsigned int> bboxes_position(n_procs);
6394 
6395  unsigned int tot_bboxes = 0;
6396  for (const auto &process_bboxes : global_bboxes)
6397  tot_bboxes += process_bboxes.size();
6398 
6399  // Now flattening the vector
6400  std::vector<std::pair<BoundingBox<spacedim>, unsigned int>>
6401  flat_global_bboxes;
6402  flat_global_bboxes.reserve(tot_bboxes);
6403  unsigned int process_index = 0;
6404  for (const auto &process_bboxes : global_bboxes)
6405  {
6406  // Initialize a vector containing bounding boxes and rank of a process
6407  std::vector<std::pair<BoundingBox<spacedim>, unsigned int>>
6408  boxes_and_indices(process_bboxes.size());
6409 
6410  // Adding to each box the rank of the process owning it
6411  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < process_bboxes.size(); ++i)
6412  boxes_and_indices[i] =
6413  std::make_pair(process_bboxes[i], process_index);
6414 
6415  flat_global_bboxes.insert(flat_global_bboxes.end(),
6416  boxes_and_indices.begin(),
6417  boxes_and_indices.end());
6418 
6419  ++process_index;
6420  }
6421 
6422  // Build a tree out of the bounding boxes. We avoid using the
6423  // insert method so that boost uses the packing algorithm
6424  return RTree<std::pair<BoundingBox<spacedim>, unsigned int>>(
6425  flat_global_bboxes.begin(), flat_global_bboxes.end());
6426 #endif // DEAL_II_WITH_MPI
6427  }
6428 
6429 
6430 
6431  template <int dim, int spacedim>
6432  void
6433  collect_coinciding_vertices(
6434  const Triangulation<dim, spacedim> & tria,
6435  std::map<unsigned int, std::vector<unsigned int>> &coinciding_vertex_groups,
6436  std::map<unsigned int, unsigned int> &vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group)
6437  {
6438  // 1) determine for each vertex a vertex it concides with and
6439  // put it into a map
6440  {
6441  static const int lookup_table_2d[2][2] =
6442  // flip:
6443  {
6444  {0, 1}, // false
6445  {1, 0} // true
6446  };
6447 
6448  static const int lookup_table_3d[2][2][2][4] =
6449  // orientation flip rotation
6450  {{{
6451  {0, 2, 1, 3}, // false false false
6452  {2, 3, 0, 1} // false false true
6453  },
6454  {
6455  {3, 1, 2, 0}, // false true false
6456  {1, 0, 3, 2} // false true true
6457  }},
6458  {{
6459  {0, 1, 2, 3}, // true false false
6460  {1, 3, 0, 2} // true false true
6461  },
6462  {
6463  {3, 2, 1, 0}, // true true false
6464  {2, 0, 3, 1} // true true true
6465  }}};
6466 
6467  // loop over all periodic face pairs
6468  for (const auto &pair : tria.get_periodic_face_map())
6469  {
6470  if (pair.first.first->level() != pair.second.first.first->level())
6471  continue;
6472 
6473  const auto face_a = pair.first.first->face(pair.first.second);
6474  const auto face_b =
6475  pair.second.first.first->face(pair.second.first.second);
6476  const auto mask = pair.second.second;
6477 
6478  AssertDimension(face_a->n_vertices(), face_b->n_vertices());
6479 
6480  // loop over all vertices on face
6481  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < face_a->n_vertices(); ++i)
6482  {
6483  const bool face_orientation = mask[0];
6484  const bool face_flip = mask[1];
6485  const bool face_rotation = mask[2];
6486 
6487  // find the right local vertex index for the second face
6488  unsigned int j = 0;
6489  switch (dim)
6490  {
6491  case 1:
6492  j = i;
6493  break;
6494  case 2:
6495  j = lookup_table_2d[face_flip][i];
6496  break;
6497  case 3:
6498  j = lookup_table_3d[face_orientation][face_flip]
6499  [face_rotation][i];
6500  break;
6501  default:
6502  AssertThrow(false, ExcNotImplemented());
6503  }
6504 
6505  // get vertex indices and store in map
6506  const auto vertex_a = face_a->vertex_index(i);
6507  const auto vertex_b = face_b->vertex_index(j);
6508  unsigned int temp = std::min(vertex_a, vertex_b);
6509 
6510  auto it_a = vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group.find(vertex_a);
6511  if (it_a != vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group.end())
6512  temp = std::min(temp, it_a->second);
6513 
6514  auto it_b = vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group.find(vertex_b);
6515  if (it_b != vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group.end())
6516  temp = std::min(temp, it_b->second);
6517 
6518  if (it_a != vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group.end())
6519  it_a->second = temp;
6520  else
6521  vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group[vertex_a] = temp;
6522 
6523  if (it_b != vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group.end())
6524  it_b->second = temp;
6525  else
6526  vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group[vertex_b] = temp;
6527  }
6528  }
6529 
6530  // 2) compress map: let vertices point to the coinciding vertex with
6531  // the smallest index
6532  for (auto &p : vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group)
6533  {
6534  if (p.first == p.second)
6535  continue;
6536  unsigned int temp = p.second;
6537  while (temp != vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group[temp])
6538  temp = vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group[temp];
6539  p.second = temp;
6540  }
6541 
6542  // 3) create a map: smallest index of coinciding index -> all
6543  // coinciding indices
6544  for (auto p : vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group)
6545  coinciding_vertex_groups[p.second] = {};
6546 
6547  for (auto p : vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group)
6548  coinciding_vertex_groups[p.second].push_back(p.first);
6549  }
6550  }
6551 
6552 
6553 
6554  template <int dim, int spacedim>
6555  std::map<unsigned int, std::set<::types::subdomain_id>>
6556  compute_vertices_with_ghost_neighbors(
6557  const Triangulation<dim, spacedim> &tria)
6558  {
6559  if (dynamic_cast<const parallel::TriangulationBase<dim, spacedim> *>(
6560  &tria) == nullptr) // nothing to do for a serial triangulation
6561  return {};
6562 
6563  // 1) collect for each vertex on periodic faces all vertices it coincides
6564  // with
6565  std::map<unsigned int, std::vector<unsigned int>> coinciding_vertex_groups;
6566  std::map<unsigned int, unsigned int> vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group;
6567 
6568  GridTools::collect_coinciding_vertices(tria,
6569  coinciding_vertex_groups,
6570  vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group);
6571 
6572  // 2) collect vertices belonging to local cells
6573  std::vector<bool> vertex_of_own_cell(tria.n_vertices(), false);
6574  for (const auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
6575  if (cell->is_locally_owned())
6576  for (const unsigned int v : cell->vertex_indices())
6577  vertex_of_own_cell[cell->vertex_index(v)] = true;
6578 
6579  // 3) for each vertex belonging to a locally owned cell all ghost
6580  // neighbors (including the periodic own)
6581  std::map<unsigned int, std::set<types::subdomain_id>> result;
6582 
6583  // loop over all active ghost cells
6584  for (const auto &cell : tria.active_cell_iterators())
6585  if (cell->is_ghost())
6586  {
6587  const types::subdomain_id owner = cell->subdomain_id();
6588 
6589  // loop over all its vertices
6590  for (const unsigned int v : cell->vertex_indices())
6591  {
6592  // set owner if vertex belongs to a local cell
6593  if (vertex_of_own_cell[cell->vertex_index(v)])
6594  result[cell->vertex_index(v)].insert(owner);
6595 
6596  // mark also nodes coinciding due to periodicity
6597  auto coinciding_vertex_group =
6598  vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group.find(cell->vertex_index(v));
6599  if (coinciding_vertex_group !=
6600  vertex_to_coinciding_vertex_group.end())
6601  for (auto coinciding_vertex :
6602  coinciding_vertex_groups[coinciding_vertex_group->second])
6603  if (vertex_of_own_cell[coinciding_vertex])
6604  result[coinciding_vertex].insert(owner);
6605  }
6606  }
6607 
6608  return result;
6609  }
6610 
6611 
6612 
6613  template <int dim, typename VectorType>
6614  MarchingCubeAlgorithm<dim, VectorType>::MarchingCubeAlgorithm(
6615  const Mapping<dim, dim> & mapping,
6616  const FiniteElement<dim, dim> &fe,
6617  const unsigned int n_subdivisions,
6618  const double tolerance)
6619  : n_subdivisions(n_subdivisions)
6620  , tolerance(tolerance)
6621  , fe_values(mapping,
6622  fe,
6623  create_quadrature_rule(n_subdivisions),
6624  update_values | update_quadrature_points)
6625  {}
6626 
6627 
6628 
6629  template <int dim, typename VectorType>
6630  Quadrature<dim>
6631  MarchingCubeAlgorithm<dim, VectorType>::create_quadrature_rule(
6632  const unsigned int n_subdivisions)
6633  {
6634  std::vector<Point<dim>> quadrature_points;
6635 
6636  if (dim == 2)
6637  {
6638  for (unsigned int j = 0; j <= n_subdivisions; ++j)
6639  for (unsigned int i = 0; i <= n_subdivisions; ++i)
6640  quadrature_points.emplace_back(1.0 / n_subdivisions * i,
6641  1.0 / n_subdivisions * j);
6642  }
6643  else
6644  {
6645  for (unsigned int k = 0; k <= n_subdivisions; ++k)
6646  for (unsigned int j = 0; j <= n_subdivisions; ++j)
6647  for (unsigned int i = 0; i <= n_subdivisions; ++i)
6648  quadrature_points.emplace_back(1.0 / n_subdivisions * i,
6649  1.0 / n_subdivisions * j,
6650  1.0 / n_subdivisions * k);
6651  }
6652 
6653 
6654  return {quadrature_points};
6655  }
6656 
6657 
6658 
6659  template <int dim, typename VectorType>
6660  void
6661  MarchingCubeAlgorithm<dim, VectorType>::process(
6662  const DoFHandler<dim> & background_dof_handler,
6663  const VectorType & ls_vector,
6664  const double iso_level,
6665  std::vector<Point<dim>> & vertices,
6666  std::vector<CellData<dim - 1>> &cells) const
6667  {
6668  for (const auto &cell : background_dof_handler.active_cell_iterators())
6669  if (cell->is_locally_owned())
6670  process_cell(cell, ls_vector, iso_level, vertices, cells);
6671  }
6672 
6673 
6674 
6675  template <int dim, typename VectorType>
6676  void
6677  MarchingCubeAlgorithm<dim, VectorType>::process_cell(
6678  const typename DoFHandler<dim>::active_cell_iterator &cell,
6679  const VectorType & ls_vector,
6680  const double iso_level,
6681  std::vector<Point<dim>> & vertices,
6682  std::vector<CellData<dim - 1>> & cells) const
6683  {
6684  std::vector<value_type> ls_values;
6685 
6686  fe_values.reinit(cell);
6687  ls_values.resize(fe_values.n_quadrature_points);
6688  fe_values.get_function_values(ls_vector, ls_values);
6689  process_cell(
6690  ls_values, fe_values.get_quadrature_points(), iso_level, vertices, cells);
6691  }
6692 
6693 
6694 
6695  template <int dim, typename VectorType>
6696  void
6697  MarchingCubeAlgorithm<dim, VectorType>::process_cell(
6698  std::vector<value_type> & ls_values,
6699  const std::vector<Point<dim>> & points,
6700  const double iso_level,
6701  std::vector<Point<dim>> & vertices,
6702  std::vector<CellData<dim - 1>> &cells) const
6703  {
6704  const unsigned p = n_subdivisions + 1;
6705 
6706  if (dim == 2)
6707  {
6708  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < n_subdivisions; ++j)
6709  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_subdivisions; ++i)
6710  {
6711  std::vector<unsigned int> mask{p * (j + 0) + (i + 0),
6712  p * (j + 0) + (i + 1),
6713  p * (j + 1) + (i + 1),
6714  p * (j + 1) + (i + 0)};
6715 
6716  process_sub_cell(
6717  ls_values, points, mask, iso_level, vertices, cells);
6718  }
6719  }
6720  else if (dim == 3)
6721  {
6722  for (unsigned int k = 0; k < n_subdivisions; ++k)
6723  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < n_subdivisions; ++j)
6724  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_subdivisions; ++i)
6725  {
6726  std::vector<unsigned int> mask{
6727  p * p * (k + 0) + p * (j + 0) + (i + 0),
6728  p * p * (k + 0) + p * (j + 0) + (i + 1),
6729  p * p * (k + 0) + p * (j + 1) + (i + 1),
6730  p * p * (k + 0) + p * (j + 1) + (i + 0),
6731  p * p * (k + 1) + p * (j + 0) + (i + 0),
6732  p * p * (k + 1) + p * (j + 0) + (i + 1),
6733  p * p * (k + 1) + p * (j + 1) + (i + 1),
6734  p * p * (k + 1) + p * (j + 1) + (i + 0)};
6735 
6736  process_sub_cell(
6737  ls_values, points, mask, iso_level, vertices, cells);
6738  }
6739  }
6740  }
6741 
6742 
6743 
6744  namespace internal
6745  {
6746  template <int dim,
6747  unsigned int n_vertices,
6748  unsigned int n_sub_vertices,
6749  unsigned int n_configurations,
6750  unsigned int n_lines,
6751  unsigned int n_cols,
6752  typename value_type>
6753  void
6754  process_sub_cell(
6755  const std::array<unsigned int, n_configurations> & cut_line_table,
6756  const ndarray<unsigned int, n_configurations, n_cols> &new_line_table,
6757  const ndarray<unsigned int, n_lines, 2> &line_to_vertex_table,
6758  const std::vector<value_type> & ls_values,
6759  const std::vector<Point<dim>> & points,
6760  const std::vector<unsigned int> & mask,
6761  const double iso_level,
6762  const double tolerance,
6763  std::vector<Point<dim>> & vertices,
6764  std::vector<CellData<dim - 1>> & cells)
6765  {
6766  // inspired by https://graphics.stanford.edu/~mdfisher/MarchingCubes.html
6767 
6768  constexpr unsigned int X = static_cast<unsigned int>(-1);
6769 
6770  // determine configuration
6771  unsigned int configuration = 0;
6772  for (unsigned int v = 0; v < n_vertices; ++v)
6773  if (ls_values[mask[v]] < iso_level)
6774  configuration |= (1 << v);
6775 
6776  // cell is not cut (nothing to do)
6777  if (cut_line_table[configuration] == 0)
6778  return;
6779 
6780  // helper function to determine where an edge (between index i and j) is
6781  // cut - see also: http://paulbourke.net/geometry/polygonise/
6782  const auto interpolate = [&](const unsigned int i, const unsigned int j) {
6783  if (std::abs(iso_level - ls_values[mask[i]]) < tolerance)
6784  return points[mask[i]];
6785  if (std::abs(iso_level - ls_values[mask[j]]) < tolerance)
6786  return points[mask[j]];
6787  if (std::abs(ls_values[mask[i]] - ls_values[mask[j]]) < tolerance)
6788  return points[mask[i]];
6789 
6790  const double mu = (iso_level - ls_values[mask[i]]) /
6791  (ls_values[mask[j]] - ls_values[mask[i]]);
6792 
6793  return Point<dim>(points[mask[i]] +
6794  mu * (points[mask[j]] - points[mask[i]]));
6795  };
6796 
6797  // determine the position where edges are cut (if they are cut)
6798  std::array<Point<dim>, n_lines> vertex_list_all;
6799  for (unsigned int l = 0; l < n_lines; ++l)
6800  if (cut_line_table[configuration] & (1 << l))
6801  vertex_list_all[l] =
6802  interpolate(line_to_vertex_table[l][0], line_to_vertex_table[l][1]);
6803 
6804  // merge duplicate vertices if possible
6805  unsigned int local_vertex_count = 0;
6806  std::array<Point<dim>, n_lines> vertex_list_reduced;
6807  std::array<unsigned int, n_lines> local_remap;
6808  std::fill(local_remap.begin(), local_remap.end(), X);
6809  for (int i = 0; new_line_table[configuration][i] != X; i++)
6810  if (local_remap[new_line_table[configuration][i]] == X)
6811  {
6812  vertex_list_reduced[local_vertex_count] =
6813  vertex_list_all[new_line_table[configuration][i]];
6814  local_remap[new_line_table[configuration][i]] = local_vertex_count;
6815  local_vertex_count++;
6816  }
6817 
6818  // write back vertices
6819  const unsigned int n_vertices_old = vertices.size();
6820  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < local_vertex_count; i++)
6821  vertices.push_back(vertex_list_reduced[i]);
6822 
6823  // write back cells
6824  for (unsigned int i = 0; new_line_table[configuration][i] != X;
6825  i += n_sub_vertices)
6826  {
6827  cells.resize(cells.size() + 1);
6828  cells.back().vertices.resize(n_sub_vertices);
6829 
6830  for (unsigned int v = 0; v < n_sub_vertices; ++v)
6831  cells.back().vertices[v] =
6832  local_remap[new_line_table[configuration][i + v]] +
6833  n_vertices_old;
6834  }
6835  }
6836  } // namespace internal
6837 
6838 
6839 
6840  template <int dim, typename VectorType>
6841  void
6842  MarchingCubeAlgorithm<dim, VectorType>::process_sub_cell(
6843  const std::vector<value_type> & ls_values,
6844  const std::vector<Point<2>> & points,
6845  const std::vector<unsigned int> mask,
6846  const double iso_level,
6847  std::vector<Point<2>> & vertices,
6848  std::vector<CellData<1>> & cells) const
6849  {
6850  // set up dimension-dependent sizes and tables
6851  constexpr unsigned int n_vertices = 4;
6852  constexpr unsigned int n_sub_vertices = 2;
6853  constexpr unsigned int n_lines = 4;
6854  constexpr unsigned int n_configurations = Utilities::pow(2, n_vertices);
6855  constexpr unsigned int X = static_cast<unsigned int>(-1);
6856 
6857  // table that indicates if an edge is cut (it the i-th bit is set the i-th
6858  // line is cut)
6859  constexpr std::array<unsigned int, n_configurations> cut_line_table = {
6860  {0b0000,
6861  0b0101,
6862  0b0110,
6863  0b0011,
6864  0b1010,
6865  0b0000,
6866  0b1100,
6867  0b1001,
6868  0b1001,
6869  0b1100,
6870  0b0000,
6871  0b1010,
6872  0b0011,
6873  0b0110,
6874  0b0101,
6875  0b0000}};
6876 
6877  // list of the definition of the newly created lines (each line is defined
6878  // by two edges it cuts)
6879  constexpr ndarray<unsigned int, n_configurations, 5> new_line_table = {
6880  {{{X, X, X, X, X}},
6881  {{0, 2, X, X, X}},
6882  {{1, 2, X, X, X}},
6883  {{0, 1, X, X, X}},
6884  {{1, 3, X, X, X}},
6885  {{X, X, X, X, X}},
6886  {{2, 3, X, X, X}},
6887  {{0, 3, X, X, X}},
6888  {{0, 3, X, X, X}},
6889  {{2, 3, X, X, X}},
6890  {{X, X, X, X, X}},
6891  {{1, 3, X, X, X}},
6892  {{0, 1, X, X, X}},
6893  {{2, 1, X, X, X}},
6894  {{0, 2, X, X, X}},
6895  {{X, X, X, X, X}}}};
6896 
6897  // vertices of each line
6898  constexpr ndarray<unsigned int, n_lines, 2> line_to_vertex_table = {
6899  {{{0, 3}}, {{1, 2}}, {{0, 1}}, {{3, 2}}}};
6900 
6901  // run dimension-independent code
6902  internal::process_sub_cell<2,
6903  n_vertices,
6904  n_sub_vertices,
6905  n_configurations,
6906  n_lines,
6907  5>(cut_line_table,
6908  new_line_table,
6909  line_to_vertex_table,
6910  ls_values,
6911  points,
6912  mask,
6913  iso_level,
6914  tolerance,
6915  vertices,
6916  cells);
6917  }
6918 
6919 
6920 
6921  template <int dim, typename VectorType>
6922  void
6923  MarchingCubeAlgorithm<dim, VectorType>::process_sub_cell(
6924  const std::vector<value_type> & ls_values,
6925  const std::vector<Point<3>> & points,
6926  const std::vector<unsigned int> mask,
6927  const double iso_level,
6928  std::vector<Point<3>> & vertices,
6929  std::vector<CellData<2>> & cells) const
6930  {
6931  // set up dimension-dependent sizes and tables
6932  constexpr unsigned int n_vertices = 8;
6933  constexpr unsigned int n_sub_vertices = 3;
6934  constexpr unsigned int n_lines = 12;
6935  constexpr unsigned int n_configurations = Utilities::pow(2, n_vertices);
6936  constexpr unsigned int X = static_cast<unsigned int>(-1);
6937 
6938  // clang-format off
6939  // table that indicates if an edge is cut (it the i-th bit is set the i-th
6940  // line is cut)
6941  constexpr std::array<unsigned int, n_configurations> cut_line_table = {{
6942  0x0, 0x109, 0x203, 0x30a, 0x406, 0x50f, 0x605, 0x70c, 0x80c, 0x905,
6943  0xa0f, 0xb06, 0xc0a, 0xd03, 0xe09, 0xf00, 0x190, 0x99, 0x393, 0x29a,
6944  0x596, 0x49f, 0x795, 0x69c, 0x99c, 0x895, 0xb9f, 0xa96, 0xd9a, 0xc93,
6945  0xf99, 0xe90, 0x230, 0x339, 0x33, 0x13a, 0x636, 0x73f, 0x435, 0x53c,
6946  0xa3c, 0xb35, 0x83f, 0x936, 0xe3a, 0xf33, 0xc39, 0xd30, 0x3a0, 0x2a9,
6947  0x1a3, 0xaa, 0x7a6, 0x6af, 0x5a5, 0x4ac, 0xbac, 0xaa5, 0x9af, 0x8a6,
6948  0xfaa, 0xea3, 0xda9, 0xca0, 0x460, 0x569, 0x663, 0x76a, 0x66, 0x16f,
6949  0x265, 0x36c, 0xc6c, 0xd65, 0xe6f, 0xf66, 0x86a, 0x963, 0xa69, 0xb60,
6950  0x5f0, 0x4f9, 0x7f3, 0x6fa, 0x1f6, 0xff, 0x3f5, 0x2fc, 0xdfc, 0xcf5,
6951  0xfff, 0xef6, 0x9fa, 0x8f3, 0xbf9, 0xaf0, 0x650, 0x759, 0x453, 0x55a,
6952  0x256, 0x35f, 0x55, 0x15c, 0xe5c, 0xf55, 0xc5f, 0xd56, 0xa5a, 0xb53,
6953  0x859, 0x950, 0x7c0, 0x6c9, 0x5c3, 0x4ca, 0x3c6, 0x2cf, 0x1c5, 0xcc,
6954  0xfcc, 0xec5, 0xdcf, 0xcc6, 0xbca, 0xac3, 0x9c9, 0x8c0, 0x8c0, 0x9c9,
6955  0xac3, 0xbca, 0xcc6, 0xdcf, 0xec5, 0xfcc, 0xcc, 0x1c5, 0x2cf, 0x3c6,
6956  0x4ca, 0x5c3, 0x6c9, 0x7c0, 0x950, 0x859, 0xb53, 0xa5a, 0xd56, 0xc5f,
6957  0xf55, 0xe5c, 0x15c, 0x55, 0x35f, 0x256, 0x55a, 0x453, 0x759, 0x650,
6958  0xaf0, 0xbf9, 0x8f3, 0x9fa, 0xef6, 0xfff, 0xcf5, 0xdfc, 0x2fc, 0x3f5,
